name: Aquatics - Preschool Swim
description: This level continues to focus on building more comfort and enjoyment in the water using songs, games, and play. While introducing more structured play in the areas of bobbing, breath control, floating, gliding and kicking on front and back, in addition to arm rotations and other elementary skills. Children aged 3 and under are required to wear swim diapers while in the pool. The ratio is 1 adult per child.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (415) 831-6800
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
